summary: Completed comprehensive testing of medical equipment maintenance scheduling system. Both backend APIs and frontend UI are working correctly with proper integration.

minor_issues.issue: Test expected 1 client but found 2 due to existing data in database
minor_issues.impact: Test-only issue, not a functional problem

passed_tests: CRUD operations for Clientes (create, read, update, delete)
CRUD operations for Equipos (create, read, update, delete)
Automatic service generation based on equipment periodicity
Equipment creation with all fields (periodicity, warranty)

success_percentage.backend: 94% (17/18 tests passed - 1 minor test data issue)
